Frequently Asked Questions

DELIVERY

Delivery is free within 20 miles of Lake Wylie, SC (zip code 29710). We can and will deliver outside of this 20-mile radius, however mileage fees will be assessed. We set up and break down play equipment for you. Our set-up and removal of the equipment will take about 30min-1hr (depending on a package size); this is not included in your booked time and is free of charge. We will need easy access to your party location prior to your event’s start time.

RENTAL PERIOD

Each package provides four hours of rental period. Please let us know if you need to rent our equipment for a longer period of time. One additional hour is $70, two additional hours are $120.

Contact us for full-day rates.

BOOKING & PAYMENT

Click on “Reserve now” and fill out the form. We will contact you within 24-48 hours.

We request a $100 deposit to reserve your date. If the equipment is returned in an extremely dirty condition at the time of pick up, we will charge a $50 dollar cleaning fee.

No booking will be confirmed until the deposit is received in full.

Remaining balance will be due one day prior to the event.

You will receive an invoice via email. You can pay via credit/debit card or paypal.

CANCELLATION

Cancellations made 7 days prior to the event will result in the loss of the $100 deposit.

OUTDOOR USE

Yes, we do set up outdoors.

The area must be flat, dry, clean and free of rocks.

We do not set up on dirt or sand.

Your child's safety is our number one priority. If the weather gets too hot (over 80 degrees) and the equipment is in direct sun, we highly recommend a shaded area or a canopy to avoid the equipment getting too hot. Ask about our canopy rentals!

If it rains, we will not set up outside. Please have a back up plan for indoor use prior to the event. If the equipment can’t be set up due to rain, we can move the reservation to another day, free of additional charges!

INDOOR USE

We do set up indoors. If you have limited space, we can make special arrangements for you. Just give us your requirements and we will make it work!

Special instructions and other restrictions (stairs, elevators, limited parking) must be disclosed in advance before your party date so that we can plan for them.

INSURANCE

We do carry general liability insurance. However, we still require our clients to sign a release of liability form before the play area is set up.

SANITATION

Clean and germ-free equipment is our top priority to help keep your children safe and healthy. We have a strict cleaning and disinfecting routine after each rental. All equipment is again sanitized after set up. We use kid friendly cleaning supplies.

RULES OF EQUIPMENT USE

Children must be supervised at all times

No shoes

No food, candy, gum or drinks

No bubbles, crayons or any coloring material

No pets

No pushing, shoving or horseplay
